text:
Robin and Mike are wonderful hosts. They were very welcoming and courteous. The room was perfect, and exactly as listed. While I was rather busy during my stay, I appreciated their invitations to things and suggestions for things to check out. 

Their place is located in a vibrant neighborhood, within walking distance of so many great places to get a sense of Austin's culture. Anyone looking to explore, or even rediscover Austin should consider staying with them on their next visit!
title: Comfy Private Guest Room
